carbon.beta

Class Toolbar.LayoutParams

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.ViewGroup.LayoutParams
      • android.view.ViewGroup.MarginLayoutParams
        • android.support.v7.app.ActionBar.LayoutParams
          • carbon.beta.Toolbar.LayoutParams
  • Enclosing class:
    Toolbar

    public static class Toolbar.LayoutParams
extends android.support.v7.app.ActionBar.LayoutParams
    Layout information for child views of Toolbars.

    Toolbar.LayoutParams extends ActionBar.LayoutParams for compatibility with existing ActionBar API. See ActionBarActivity.setActionBar for more info on how to use a Toolbar as your Activity's ActionBar.
